title: Software Engineer, Layer Licensing
description: Joined Layer Licensing as a Freelance Software Engineer to develop their new offering, Accord.

title: Graduated from University of Melbourne
description: Two years, several mental breakdowns, and one Master's later - I made it. Also officially became a coffee snob. ðŸ¥‚

title: App Development with JointSense
description: As part of a mandatory Software Engineering Project, worked with a newly founded startup JointSense to develop a mobile app to help physiotherapy students analyze and quantify joint assessments using a IMU sensor.

title: VR Software Developer Intern, Virtetic
description: Joined Virtetic as a VR Software Developer Intern to develop a globally distributed database and cloud architecture, and also develop an in-game visual leaderboard for their VR games.

title: Commenced Masters of Information Technology, University of Melbourne
Migrated to Melbourne
description: Goodbye Delhi heat, hello Melbourne rain. Brought 23 kg of luggage and 2300 kg of ambition. It just got real, people.

title: ReWorld Earth
description: Joined ReWorld as a Frontend Engineer to develop their pilot website, but stuck around voluntarily because climate change is real, and we need to act now.

title: Software Engineer, Openhouse
description: Worked as a Backend Engineer to help build a platform to promote offline learning in young children. Learnt a lot about backend development, and product development.

title: Graduated from University of Delhi
description: Got a degree in Statistics during a global pandemic. Nothing screams 'resilience' louder than online exams at 9AM.

title: Freelance Web Developer
description: Worked with multiple SMBs and startups to build their websites and web applications.

title: Frontend Engineer, Blue Ocean Global Technology
description: Worked as a Frontend Engineer to help BOGT's clients.

title: Javascript Engineer Intern, Pabio
description: Got a trial internship with Pabio, and my first taste of working in a startup and with large codebases.

title: Internship Fair Portal
description: Built my first production ready project for my undergrad college, used by over 600 students. Accidentally became the IT guy for my entire undergrad batch.

title: Self learn programming
description: Lockdown + YouTube + irrational confidence = Programmer. Started with HTML, ended up knee-deep in Git.

title: Commenced Bachelors of Science in Statistics, University of Delhi
KiD Inc. - first tryst with development
description: Developed Android apps with a mate using MIT App Inventor. Got 2K downloads. Then gave it up because... exams. RIP early startup dreams.

title: Started a Youtube Channel
description: Started a Youtube Channel sharing Microsoft Powerpoint tutorials, and Pika Software Builder tutorials (got over 40K views). Removed the videos in 2017 when I realised I was a nerd (and the videos were cringe). Still have my loyal ~300 subscribers.
